title: CYBER_COWBOY
author: CYBER_COWBOY
created_time: June 10, 2023, 04:41:33 AMLast edit: June 10, 2023, 09:43:26 AM by CYBER_COWBOY
content: Hello.I send you BTC of $55 and you send me  TRC20 - USDT of $52.Could anyone help me?    To avoid pointless answers!No newbie or bad reputation accounts.With a trusted user of course I go first.It´s a small amount and I looking for a fast trade, please don´t take up my time for nothing.

comments.author: KaosanRoad
comments.body: I am new on this forum but could help you, is that possible?But I have full respect if you dont want to trade with me since I am what you say a newbie.But I could send you the USDT first if that feel you safe.

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Quote from: KaosanRoad on June 11, 2023, 05:12:35 AMI am new on this forum but could help you, is that possible?But I have full respect if you dont want to trade with me since I am what you say a newbie.But I could send you the USDT first if that feel you safe.Not interested thanks.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Since it's a small amount: an instant exchanger can do this, for instance fixedfloat.com. Disclaimer: I wouldn't trust them with large amounts, so don't take this as a vouch.

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceV on June 11, 2023, 11:28:16 AMSince it's a small amount: an instant exchanger can do this, for instance fixedfloat.com. Disclaimer: I wouldn't trust them with large amounts, so don't take this as a vouch.Thank you. Exhange is complete.
